responseText: If you're really curious, I intend to found a museum of the history of the last days of Verra as it happened! I've already learned quite a bit that confounds the stories I was taught in university on Sanctus! Things I was assured were abject myth have been shown to be true, while things I had been taught from birth were simple facts have been revealed to be superstitious bias. I haven't been so inspired since I was a lad! Why, though, do you ask so many questions? Do you have a concern? I assure you, I and my assistants are very careful with our catalogs! No bone unturned!
name: SQ_NOC_RVR_Samias_Miraleth_MartinSwift_10_Response
